File List

Here is a list of all documented files with brief descriptions:
adc/fb_adc.cTest program to use ADC to measure bus voltage The ADC return a 10-bit value. Vin=(ADC * Vref) / 1024. Example: If the ADC is 0x024D the value is 589. Vin=(589 * 5) / 1024=2,876V We have a voltage seperator in place to measure 50V. It is 1M to 110k. Vbus = Vadc * ( (R1+R2) / R2). Vbus = (ADC * Vref * (R1 + R2)) / (1024 * R1) = (589 * 5 * (1000k + 110k)) / (1024 * 110k) = 29,02V
adc/fb_adc.h [code]A test program to use the ADC port 0
ain10v/fb_ain10v.cTo use the 09609110.vd1 Analog-Sensorschnittstelle 4-fach at the moment only for 0-10V !!

include/freebus-atmega168.h [code]Hardware specific options for the ATmega168, for board with RF. DO NOT INCLUDE THAT FILE DIRECTLY, include fb_hardware.h instead
include/freebus-atmega168p.h [code]Hardware specific options for the ATmega168P / ATmega328P, for board with RF. DO NOT INCLUDE THAT FILE DIRECTLY, include fb_hardware.h instead
include/freebus-debug.h [code]Header file to map debugging between several output devices. Possible outputs are lcd, uart and no debugging. To select the correct output define the compile variable DEBUG_LCD for lcd output DEBUG_UART for uart output HARDWARETEST for a hardware test DEBUG_TIMING to test bus timing (IO1-IO8 is used to set pin high and low to see what is called) SENDTESTTEL if prog button is clicked a test telegram will be send
include/lcd-lib.h [code]
include/msg_queue.h [code]Definitions for the message queue system used for telegrams and communucation like debugging (also rs232 communication)
include/rf22.h [code]
include/Spi.h [code]
include/uart.h [code]Handles communication via uart (polling mode)
lib/fb_eeprom.cThe memory is divided into two parts. The complete size of the memory is tbd.
0x00CE-0x00DF: User memory (0x00CE-0x00DF), 18 Byte
0x0100-0x01FF: EEprom Handles communication from and to eeprom
lib/fb_hal.cFreebus Hardware Layer. Implementation of a software- uart + timer handling This file consists of function which are bound to the hardware For further information check the pdf 03_02_02 Communication Medium TP 1 v1.0 AS.PDF
lib/fb_prot.cHandle all requests which are EIB bases like write current address or group address
lib/lcd-lib.cLib to control a 4x20 character display with 3 wires the current file works only with 8Bit mode with 3 wires and a bit shifter called 74HC164N. It is only included if -DDEBUG_LCD is set at compile time
lib/msg_queue.cManagement of messagequeues
lib/uart.cHandles communication via uart (polling mode). Is only included if compiled with -DDEBUG_UART
